item.title: N.Y. AG Letitia James: Falsifying Charges Are 'Baseless'
item.description: New York Attorney General Letitia James claims accusations she falsified real estate records are "baseless."

item.title: Trump Taps Mark Levin, Dietl, McMaster to Homeland Council
item.description: President Donald Trump has announced four new members for his revamped Homeland Security Advisory Council, saying they will do an "incredible job."
